job_title: Legal Solutions Global Security Program Manager

job_details.experience_required: 10 years, with minimum 3 years leading large scale projects

jd: From: Jay, Brillius jay.s@brillius.com Reply to: jay.s@brillius.com - Minimum 3 years of managing large scale and complex programs- Experience in Legal operations a plus- Large scale project management experience mandatory- Strong familiarity using Apple based tools required (Chorus, Quip, Keynote, Wrike) mandatory- Demonstrated ability to take initiative in an ambiguous environment mandatory- 10 years project management experience, of which minimal 3 years leading large scale projects- Excellent verbal and communication skills mandatory - scrubbed deliverables requested- Self motivated and able to work with minimal supervision mandatory- Ability to work with Leadership and contribute meaningfully to strategic planning initiatives mandatory- Executive presence and ability to influence outcomes when identifying innovative opportunities,presenting plans and building support for process improvements mandatory- Strong leadership, collaboration, communication, interpersonal, problem-solving, decision-making
